Send a request to show players the store offer.

== Syntax ==
: <code>sendshowstoreoffer <player: target> <redirectType: RedirectLocation> <offerId: string></code>
: <code>sendshowstoreoffer <player: target> server</code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|player: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: {{arg desc|be=CommandSelector<Player>}}
{{argument|be=1|redirectType: RedirectLocation|enum}}
: Specifies the redirect type, values are:
:* <code>marketplace</code>
:* <code>character</code>
{{argument|be=1|offerId: string|string}}
: Specifies the offer ID.
: {{arg desc|be=string}}
